attributes.action:
Stop China from oppressing Hong Kong 
, stop trading with China
attributes.additional_details: Hong Kong is such a wonderful place and at the moment is being completely opposed. I want the people of Hong Kong to feel safe. The only way this can happen is with the help of the UK. Thank you.
attributes.background: I want the government to make sure all people from Hong Kong can be given British citizenship. Pressure  the government into acting on China.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Censure the Chinese Government for ignoring the Sino-British Joint declaration: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/322078

Offer Citizenship to the people of Hong Kong: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323543

To introduce "Hong Kong Bill 2019-2021" as a government bill: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/322361
